name: DELVE (itch) (GlobalYam)
description:
Delve into the depths to fight against the slime mold.

Survive as long as you can.

CONTROLS

WASD

Q - swap weapon mode

RIGHT MOUSE - attack, shoot, throw held bomb, shield bash when blocking

LEFT MOUSE - block, hold bomb

SPACE - dash, select

ALT AND ENTER - TOGGLE FULL-SCREEN
